audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear optimization of existing marketing function - improving audience targeting to increase conversion rates. This is a replicable pattern for other organizations using data analytics for marketing optimization.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific quantified metric (2.6x higher conversion rates) with clear comparison baseline (other first-party audiences). Organization is named (Millennium BCP) and appears to be from an authoritative source.
audited_claims.notes: Strong Tier 1 case showing measurable improvement in marketing effectiveness through better data utilization

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimization of marketing function showing volume improvements through better audience targeting. Replicable pattern for organizations with similar data analytics capabilities.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific quantified metric (2.4x greater conversion volume) with clear baseline comparison. Named organization with traceable claims.
audited_claims.notes: Complements C1 by showing both rate and volume improvements from the same optimization

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear optimization of paid media marketing function with measurable improvements. Pattern is replicable for other organizations running paid media campaigns.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metrics provided (doubled conversion volume, 1.9x higher conversion rates) with clear attribution to BigQuery-powered audiences. Named organization with detailed claims.
audited_claims.notes: Strong evidence of paid media optimization through improved audience targeting

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Optimization of marketing efficiency through cost reduction while maintaining or improving performance. Highly replicable pattern for marketing operations.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific quantified metric (36% CPA reduction) with clear comparison baseline. Named organization with precise measurement.
audited_claims.notes: Demonstrates cost efficiency gains alongside performance improvements from previous claims

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Clear optimization of IT deployment processes showing dramatic efficiency improvement. Highly replicable pattern for organizations implementing DevOps/automation practices.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific and dramatic improvement metric (8 days to 8 minutes) though lacks some detail on methodology. The scale of improvement suggests legitimate process automation.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Significant IT process optimization showing classic automation benefits, though could benefit from more implementation detail

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. All claims describe optimization of existing business functions (marketing and IT deployment) rather than business model innovation or new revenue streams.
